message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is truly a game-changer in its field, offering unparalleled benefits and capabilities. Considering its exceptional value and unique features, I am extending an exclusive offer to you today. Would you like to explore the details and consider acquiring this remarkable product?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1500000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
